announcements.title: Environmental Innovator Award
announcements.text: For outstanding dedication to environmental research and community impact, this award recognizes those who transform data into action and science into solutions.

announcements.title: Rising Artist Recognition
announcements.text: Celebrating the voice that emerged from our community to touch hearts across the globe. This artist embodies the spirit of WorldBridger One through every note and lyric.

announcements.text: Today we celebrate a monumental achievement - 1000 students have completed our environmental certification program. Each one is now an ambassador of change in their community.

announcements.title: Outstanding Mentor Award
announcements.text: For countless hours of guidance, unwavering support, and transformative impact on the next generation. This mentor has changed lives through dedication and wisdom.

announcements.title: Community Hero Recognition
announcements.text: Some work tirelessly behind the scenes, asking for nothing but driven by everything. Today we honor the volunteer who embodies the heart of our community.
